summary: This mod adds a new and very strong follower to the world of Skyrim. This follower is made for a tank tipe of player that like to get past levels like there nothing.  This follower can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn In RiverWood. hope you love this mod as much as i loved making it.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new and very strong follower to the world of Skyrim. This follower is made for a tank tipe of player that like to get past levels like there nuthing. he will come equiped with 2 of the same sword one for him and one for you. the sword is a glass sword that does over 90 damage and a enchantment that very helpful in bad areas. This follower can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn In RiverWood. hope you love this mod as much as i loved making it. If you have any ideas for other mods you think i should do please tell me or if there are any problems with any of my mods. Thanks and have fun with my mod.

NOW ON STEAM!
author: trebler123
